description: steel +â€Ž -man. For the second definition, possibly coined as the inverse of straw man.

entries.meaning: A stronger version of an argument that one is about to critically analyze.

verbs.description: steelman (third-person singular simple present steelmans, present participle steelmanning, simple past and past participle steelmanned)

entries.meaning: To repair flaws in an argument before analyzing it critically; to refute or to weaken the force of a stronger version of an argument  than what was actually given.
